name: Tilt Maze
description: In this challenge you have to find a 4 digit code which is hidden in the maze. If you have reached your goals, use your language skills to find a meaning in the symbols.

hints.name: General approach
hints.text:
Try to move the blue ball to the orange checkpoints
without falling into the black holes by tilting the maze.

hints.name: Decoding
hints.text:
Try to find a word in the letters you have found
and sort the numbers accordingly.

hints.name: Partial solution
hints.text: The Word you are looking for is 'HOLE'.

hints.name: Complete solution
hints.text:
The solution is '1970'. Press the 'key' button on the
bottom left to open the keyboard and enter the code.
